title: Head of Business Systems
description:
GitHub helps companies and organizations succeed with GitHub so they can build better software, together. We are passionate about helping bring GitHub to companies and organizations all over the world.

The Head of Business Systems will report to the CFO and oversee technology projects, programs, and systems that primarily support our key business functions relating to sales, finance, human resources, and marketing. These systems include employee facing, customer facing, and partner facing business solutions. This role will also work closely with system owners in other departments including security, infrastructure, engineering, and product management to ensure successful integration with, and support of, key business functions.

This strategic role is accountable for driving the creation and selection of internal business systems strategy, technology platform and architecture for key business functions and the overall planning, execution and success of systems projects that impact the entire company.

The ideal candidate will have strong solutions, application, development and project management experience and a general understanding of technical infrastructure.

  • Grow a multi-functional support and operations team dedicated to the key business systems
  • Develop, coordinate and implement plans designed to increase existing business and capture new business opportunities

  • Define project budgets, plans and identify interfaces and dependencies within the company
  • Direct the use of third-party resources to provide delivery and maintenance of applications and solutions
  • Manage the day to day operational relationships with key strategic vendor and outsourced service providers
  • Ensure service level agreements are met or exceeded and costs for solutions and services match expected values
  • Contribute to the technology decisions, methods, and roadmap for system implementations and integrations
  • Direct the maintenance and modification of systems as business requirements evolve while juggling competing stakeholder priorities
  • Establish clear, effective evaluation and communication channels and processes within the organization surrounding these business systems

  • 10 years experience in project management and/or implementing systems related projects
  • Strong problem solving, analytical, planning, and reasoning skills
  • Strong financial background and familiarity with purchasing, compliance, audits
  • Technical background and understanding of technology architecture, APIs, and integration best practices with experience leading technical team members and vendors
  • Strong functional knowledge of data security and risk management concepts
  • Experience with B2B and Enterprise products and purchasing flows
  • Experience with industry CRMs, ERPs, data warehouses, financial reporting tools
  • Experience with international business requirements, policies, and processes
  • Proven experience defining and growing systems support a "growth" enterprise product
  • Strong leadership, planning and project management skills
  • Product management experience, including defining product iterations and roadmaps
  • Ability to effectively capture and communicate both high-level vision and detailed requirements from diverse stakeholder and business groups
